name: part_001
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】紫咲シオン 4th Anniversary LIVE【#紫咲シオン4周年記念】 [WkUXJUQMZ-8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Introduction animation and logo display for Murasaki Shion's 4th Anniversary LIVE.
Performance of the song "Mage of Violet".
MC section where Murasaki Shion addresses the audience and introduces the anniversary theme.

subtitles.original: うらぱっぱ 馬鹿見てないで
subtitles.english: Urappa-ppa, don't look like an idiot

subtitles.original: うらぱっぱっぱらりら 踊れよ
subtitles.english: Urappa-ppa-pararira, just dance

subtitles.original: 魔界脱走の優等生
subtitles.english: The honor student who escaped the demon world

subtitles.original: 華やかな我儘 讃えよ
subtitles.english: Praise this glamorous selfishness

subtitles.original: いないいないばぁで こっち向いて
subtitles.english: Peek-a-boo, look this way

subtitles.original: したたかな未来を咲かせよ
subtitles.english: Let a sturdy future bloom

subtitles.original: 仕合待って 高まって
subtitles.english: Waiting for the match, getting excited

subtitles.original: たまーにパワー放て黒魔術
subtitles.english: Occasionally release power, black magic

subtitles.original: せーの！で此処に集えよ
subtitles.english: One, two! Gather here

subtitles.original: 闇に震えケルベロス
subtitles.english: Cerberus trembling in the darkness

subtitles.original: 刹那に響く言葉は
subtitles.english: The words that echo in an instant

subtitles.original: ぶち切れ発狂パラダイス
subtitles.english: Are a snap-and-go-crazy paradise

subtitles.original: キラリ心奥底まで届け
subtitles.english: Sparkle, reach the depths of my heart

subtitles.original: これからも私の元で
subtitles.english: Stay by my side from now on too

subtitles.original: 不思議な力打ち放って
subtitles.english: Release the mysterious power

subtitles.original: 世界も笑顔になっちゃって
subtitles.english: And the world will start smiling

subtitles.original: うらぱっぱっぱらりら歌えば
subtitles.english: If we sing 'urappappa-pararira'

subtitles.original: 一生一緒だよね
subtitles.english: We'll be together forever, right?

subtitles.original: 暗い面してないで
subtitles.english: Don't look so gloomy

subtitles.original: なまった体 さぁ 踊れよ
subtitles.english: Come on, dance with that stiff body

subtitles.original: 視界外 目逸らさないで
subtitles.english: Don't look away from my sight

subtitles.original: 今はただ離れていかないで
subtitles.english: For now, just don't go away

subtitles.original: やや待って こっち向いて
subtitles.english: Wait a bit, look this way

subtitles.original: 今はまだ心の準備を
subtitles.english: I'm still preparing my heart

subtitles.original: 期待猜疑で固まって
subtitles.english: Frozen with expectation and suspicion

subtitles.original: うらぱっぱっぱ 動け黒魔術
subtitles.english: Urappappa, move, black magic

subtitles.original: 我に続け 今宵よ
subtitles.english: Follow me tonight

subtitles.original: 闇を破れメシアよ
subtitles.english: Break the darkness, O Messiah

subtitles.original: 討つべき者 その名は
subtitles.english: The one to strike, that name is...

subtitles.original: 眠りの発症パラダイス
subtitles.english: The onset of sleep paradise

subtitles.original: キラリ心奥底まで届け
subtitles.english: Sparkle, reach the depths of my heart

subtitles.original: 白黒つけてあげるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll make things clear

subtitles.original: 不思議な力振りかざして
subtitles.english: Brandish the mysterious power

subtitles.original: みんなで笑顔になっちゃって
subtitles.english: And let's all smile together

subtitles.original: うらぱっぱっぱらりら歌えば
subtitles.english: If we sing 'urappappa-pararira'

subtitles.original: 一生一緒かもね
subtitles.english: Maybe we'll be together forever

subtitles.original: ひらりひらりと紫に染まって
subtitles.english: Fluttering and fluttering, dyed in violet

subtitles.original: これからも貴方の元で
subtitles.english: From now on too, by your side

subtitles.original: 奇跡の呪文解き放って
subtitles.english: Release the miracle incantation

subtitles.original: 咲かせる笑顔の花を
subtitles.english: Let the flowers of smiles bloom

subtitles.original: キラリ心奥底まで届け
subtitles.english: Sparkle, reach the depths of my heart

subtitles.original: これからも変わらないままで
subtitles.english: Staying unchanged from now on too

subtitles.original: 不思議な力 ほら 宿って
subtitles.english: Look, the mysterious power dwells within

subtitles.original: 世界も笑顔になっちゃって
subtitles.english: And the world will start smiling

subtitles.original: うらぱっぱっぱらりら歌えば
subtitles.english: If we sing 'urappappa-pararira'

subtitles.original: 一生一緒だよね
subtitles.english: We'll be together forever, right?

subtitles.original: 絶対一緒だよね
subtitles.english: Definitely together forever, right?

subtitles.original: はい！ということで！
subtitles.english: Yes! And so!

subtitles.original: 紫咲シオン4周年記念ライブ！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Murasaki Shion 4th Anniversary LIVE! Yay!

subtitles.original: このね、出てると思いますけど画面の端に。どっち？こっちかな？
subtitles.english: I think it's appearing at the edge of the screen. Which side? This side?

subtitles.original: こっちだー！出てる通り、ハッシュタグ紫咲シオン4周年記念で是非いっぱいツイートしてください。
subtitles.english: It's this side! As shown, please tweet a lot with the hashtag #Murasaki Shion 4th Anniversary Celebration.

subtitles.original: スクショもね、いっぱい撮ってね。
subtitles.english: Take lots of screenshots too, okay?

subtitles.original: はい、なんと4周年らしいです。ね、びっくりだよね。
subtitles.english: Yes, apparently it's the 4th anniversary. It's surprising, isn't it?

subtitles.original: だって5年目に入っちゃうわけでしょ？
subtitles.english: Because I'm entering my 5th year, right?

subtitles.original: 5年ってさ、普通に考えてヤバいよな。なんか5ってキリが良いから。
subtitles.english: 5 years, if you think about it, is amazing. 5 is such a good milestone.

subtitles.original: ま、まだ4年、4年なんですけど。
subtitles.english: Well, it's still 4 years, just 4 years though.

subtitles.original: いや凄い本当に。長いようで短かった気がする。
subtitles.english: It's really amazing. It feels like it was long yet short.

subtitles.original: ね、サムネもね、見て後ろにあるんだけど。遠いな。
subtitles.english: Look at the thumbnail too, it's behind me. It's far.

subtitles.original: 遠いけど、後ろにある通りめちゃめちゃ可愛いでしょ？
subtitles.english: It's far, but as you can see behind me, isn't it super cute?

subtitles.original: ね、このサムネに映ってる通りですね、なんと！
subtitles.english: Just as shown in this thumbnail, guess what!

subtitles.original: ゲストが3人来てくれてます！楽しみだね。
subtitles.english: Three guests have come! I'm looking forward to it.

subtitles.original: あ！早速ゲストの1人目が来てるみたい。
subtitles.english: Oh! It looks like the first guest is already here.
